text:
We have little dictators popping up all across the U.S. 

What do they have in common?

Gretchen Whitmer Michigan DEMOCRAT
Andrew Beshear Kentucky DEMOCRAT
Ralph Northam Virginia DEMOCRAT

#WalkAway from DEMOCRATS
#coronavirus #COVID19
#MAGA
